Will Hartung wrote:
> I would argue that there is no distinction between resource and
> representation.

OK, I disagree with that.

There are, obviously, cases where concepts might seem intuitively like 
they should be a collection of  representations when they are actually 
resources.

The example with lossy images; your system will treat them mechanically 
as completely separate resources, and therefore it makes sense to 
respect that. That does not speak for every case, though.

- Mike
